Mbuko bụ asụsụ Afro-Asiatic a na-asụ na canton nke Doulek, Méri subdivision, ngalaba nke Diamaré, nakwa n'akụkụ nke canton nke Serawa, Tokombéré subdivision.
Mbuko (ndị na-ekwu okwu 6,700) na-ebi na Mbuko massif, nke dị n'akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Meri
Ha na-ebikwa na mgbada gbara agbata obi nke Mayo-Ranéo (na kanton Doulek, arrondissement nke Meri, ngalaba nke Diamaré, Far North Region).
